readable.title: 311196733_03966b4836
readable.content: A man looks out of the passenger window of a yellow car to see the tire smoking . A yellow car , a man in it looking to the back where steam is coming out . A yellow car is creating smoke by spinning its tires . A yellow car spins its rear wheel while a man in the backseat watches . A yellow muscle car is burning rubber while a man in the car with blonde hair looks at the tire .
